# Configs

# config

全局配置

  • base
  • lang
  • title
  • description
  • head
  • theme
  • plugins

# Frontmatter

页面级作用域的配置

  • Vuepress
    • date yyyy-mm-dd
    • description
    • head
    • lang
    • title
  • Theme

# Theme

Default theme is enough

  • colorMode
  • colorModeSwitch
  • navbar
    • NavbarItem
      • text link
    • NavbarGroup
      • text children
    • String
  • logo
  • repo
  • sidebar
    • false 'auto'
    • SidebarConfigArray[]
      • text link children[]
      • String
      • collapsible:boolean 可否折叠
    • SidebarConfigObject{} 设定不同路径下情况
      • '/path/':SidebarConfigArray[{}]
  • sidebarDepth
  • lastUpdated
  • notFound
